name: Iron Master: The Legendary Blacksmith
summary:
When a war is going on, blacksmiths are critical. In Iron Master: The Legendary Blacksmith, players take on the role of one of these blacksmiths.

The main focus of the game is forging. Forging equipment is done through a mini-game in a step-by-step process. Casting, chopping, cutting, tempering, stretching, hammering, and melting are involved in this complex process.
